function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of consideration for occupancy rates and physical distancing in strategies","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne transmission and infection","Mitigation":"Incorporate analytical strategies for occupancy rates and physical distancing into built environment guidelines","Technologies":"Sensors, occupancy tracking systems, and design modifications for distancing","People":"Occupants of built environments","Owner":"Regulatory authorities, building owners, and designers"},{"Description":"Weak sustainability approach of SRS promoting economic development over natural capitals","Impact":"Reduction of natural resources and environmental degradation","Mitigation":"Promote the integration of strong sustainability principles in the development of built environments","Technologies":"Sustainable building materials, renewable energy systems, and green infrastructure","People":"Environmental and sustainability advocates, regulators, and policy makers","Owner":"Regulatory authorities, developers, and designers"},{"Description":"Inconsistent consideration of food and vaccines implications in Fitwel","Impact":"Lack of comprehensive health and wellness strategies in built environments","Mitigation":"Integrate considerations for food and vaccines implications into health and wellness guidelines","Technologies":"Healthy food access planning, vaccination promotion programs, and wellness education","People":"Occupants and visitors of built environments","Owner":"Health organizations, public health agencies, and building operators"}]}
